hero.title: How It Works
hero.subtitle: Learn how to use Picks4All in minutes and start competing with your friends. Whether you call it a pool, bracket, or prediction game, here's how it works.

jsonLd.name: How to create a free sports prediction pool
jsonLd.description: Step-by-step guide to creating your sports prediction pool with Picks4All. Invite friends and compete by predicting football match results.

steps.name: Create your account
steps.text: Sign up for free with your email or Google. It only takes a few seconds.

steps.name: Create your pool
steps.text: Choose a tournament, name your pool, and set up the scoring rules.

steps.name: Invite your friends
steps.text: Share the invite code via WhatsApp, email, or however you like.

steps.name: Publish the results
steps.text: Enter the official score after each match. The leaderboard updates automatically.

steps.name: Enjoy the competition
steps.text: Watch the rankings rise and fall among your friends.

steps.title: Create your account
steps.description: Sign up for free with your email or Google. It only takes a few seconds.

steps.title: Create your pool
steps.description: Choose a tournament (e.g., World Cup 2026), name your pool, and set up the rules: scoring system, deadline before each match, etc.

steps.title: Invite your friends
steps.description: Generate an invite code and share it via WhatsApp, email, or however you like. Anyone with the code can join your pool.

steps.title: Publish the results
steps.description: After each match, enter the official score. The leaderboard updates automatically.

steps.title: Enjoy the competition
steps.description: Watch the rankings rise and fall. Appoint co-admins if you need help managing your pool.

steps.title: Get the invite code
steps.description: Your friend (the Host) will share a unique code so you can join their prediction pool.

steps.title: Create your account and join
steps.description: Sign up if you don't have an account yet, then enter the code to join the pool.

steps.title: Make your predictions
steps.description: For each match, submit your prediction before the deadline (usually 10 minutes before kickoff).

steps.title: Earn points
steps.description: When the results are published, you'll earn points based on your accuracy: exact score, correct outcome, goal difference, and more.

steps.title: Climb the rankings
steps.description: Track your position on the leaderboard and prove you're the best predictor in the group.
